title: SkiaSharp from NuGet not work with UWP
body:
This line
`var canvas = SKSurface.Create(100, 100, SKColorType.N_32, SKAlphaType.Premul);`

throws 
`'System.BadImageFormatException' in Unknown Module.`

Steps to reproduce:
-  Update to VS 2015 update 3.
- Make Blank UWP project
- Install SkiaSharp from NuGet
- add button and onclick handler:

```
button.Click += delegate (object sender, RoutedEventArgs e){
     var canvas = SKSurface.Create(100, 100, SKColorType.N_32, SKAlphaType.Premul);
};
```
- launch in Debug x86 / x64 mode
